title: O'Neill Generation - Costa Rica
description:
France is one of the oldest Surf European countries while Belgium is one of the newest action sports land of the old continent. France has the experience while Belgium has the freshness of the new factor... 
It is a bit the same story when it comes to experienced surfers versus young shredders. The older ones have more thinking and maturity in their approach, waiting for the good waves, working out the style and the lines while the young dudes are all about craziness, improving their performances and catching as many waves they can possibly catch. Different surfers, with different boards, from different countries and generations; that is what we are talking about here. O'Neill organized that trip to Costa Rica based on the generations and countries encounters. When experienced surfers from France hook up with the uprising Belgium Groms.
